task.title: How to Make the Vegetables
task.shortdesc: Vegetables will add a lot of extra flavor to your burrito.

ul.li: Medium skillet (in the bottom cabinet next to the fridge.)

step.cmd: Heat the skillet to medium heat.
Dice the vegetables (to about 1 square cm each)
Pour the olive oil into the skillet.
Stir until the vegetables are soft and the onions are brown, and then remove from heat

postreq.p: You can set this aside until it is time to assemble your burrito.
